Package kchandra423.utility

Class Calculator

java.lang.Object
kchandra423.utility.Calculator
public class Calculator extends Object
A basic utility to do basic calculations. Currently only calculates angles between points
Author:
Kumar Chandra

  • Method Details

    • calculateAngle

      public static double calculateAngle​(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Calculates the angle from one point to another. All values are given in the format of the math class' atan2 method
      Parameters:
      x1 - The x coordinate of the starting point
      y1 - The y coordinate of the starting point
      x2 - The x coordinate of the ending point
      y2 - The y coordinate of the ending point
      Returns:
      An angle in radians between -pi and pi
      See Also:
      Math

    • calculateDamage

      public static float calculateDamage​(Damage damage, float[] defenseStats)
      Calculates the damage that a damage would do on some actor, with the specified stats. Damage is calculated by using the baseDamage and multiplying by the attack value for the given attack type, divided the defense value for the given attack type. For example, if you attack with a base damage of 40, a damage type of MAGIC, and the damage has an magic attack stat of 60, and the defender has a magic defense stat of 40, the defender would take 60 points of damage.
      Parameters:
      damage - The specified damage
      defenseStats - All the stats off the defending actor
      Returns:
      Returns the calculated damage to be dealt to the defender.
